bilingual.source: It is the fastest and the second cheapest.
bilingual.target: 它是最快的，也是第二便宜的。

bilingual.source: Canada is the second largest country in the world.
bilingual.target: 加拿大是世界上第二大国家。

bilingual.source: It's on the second Sunday in May.
bilingual.target: 在五月的第二个星期天。

bilingual.source: The wolf went to the second house.
The second piece of advice is this.
Try to read the second one correctly.
bilingual.target: 尝试正确地读第二个单词。
第二个问题是关于口语的。

list.abstract: second（英 [ˈsekənd , sɪˈkɒnd]，美 [ˈsekənd , sɪˈkɑːnd]），英语单词，作数词为第二；第二次；从属的。作动词为支持；赞成；临时调派。作名词为秒；瞬间；片刻。短语搭配有give a second thought（再想想）。例句为“Second, walking on tiptoes is good for your eyesight.（其次，用脚尖走路对视力有好处。）” second相关近义词有moment、breath等，相关反义词有first。
《SECOND》是螺丝钉最有爆发性的专辑之一，在短短的一年内历经千场以上的校园与全台巡回演出 超过百万人见证的现场魅力 。

yingyinNormal.en: Second, it's not Amy, it's everybody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二，不光是艾米，而是每个人。

yingyinNormal.en: And what's the second way?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那第二种方法是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Got to like judges who give second chances.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最喜欢给人第二次机会的法官了。

yingyinNormal.en: The second is mental. Again, breaking point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二阶段是精神训练，同样要练到极限。

yingyinNormal.en: That's why you and I never had a second date.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是为什么你和我没有第二次约会。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, it's third down. No it's not, it's second.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂，是第三次十码进攻了。才不是，这是第二次而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on guys. Let's go. Come on, it's second down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们，调情的男孩，我们在比赛。来吧，开始了，第二次十码进攻。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the second model? What are you talking about? All-in-one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二款产品是什么？你在说什么呢？一体机

yingyinNormal.en: Second of all and much more importantly this is Charles' decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二，更重要的是，这是查尔斯的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, first I'm not crazy. And second, say it don't spray it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一，我没有疯，第二，用说的，别用喷的。

yingyinNormal.en: Second, never harm another Glader. None of this works unless we have trust.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二，永远不要伤害同伴，我们必须彼此信任。

yingyinNormal.en: And second, I sense that something is troubling you. Am I right, Harry?
yingyinNormal.zh: 至于第二，我觉得你好像被什么事困扰着。对不对，哈利？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Second one I failed, thanks to you. And the car bomb was insurance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多亏你，我没能杀了第二个人。而汽车炸弹则是最后的杀手锏。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. First of all, you're fired. Second, I'm taking this company cell phone until such time as.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，首先，你被解雇了，第二，我现在收走公司的手机。

yingyinNormal.en: Max, you do fake stairs so well. I know. It's the second best thing I fake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，你好会演假装下楼梯。我知道，这是我"假"得第二好的事。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, maybe I should let you and the second prettiest girl in Oklahoma get back to work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，或许我应该让你跟奥克拉荷马第二漂亮的女生回去工作了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, first of all, you were just leaving. Second of all, maybe permanently. Yeah. Faster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，你刚刚都打算离开了；第二，永远别回来了。好的。滚快点。

yingyinNormal.en: Where am I? This is the Alcazar of Kalique Abrasax, second primary of the house of Abrasax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是哪？这里是凯莉克阿拜萨斯的城堡，是阿拜萨斯的第二大城堡。

yingyinNormal.en: So it was like my second or third home game, And I hadn't even been in a game yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时已经是我到球队后的第二还是第三场主场比赛了,我甚至还从未上过场。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but your ability to perceive their existence is conditional on you passing the second and third barriers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，但对你来说卧室的存在是有条件的，你要通过第二和第三关。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 二战；世界二战；第二次世界大战

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 第二的；第二位的；副的；二代的；中等教育的；次级的；仲的

word_family.mean: num. 第二；第二次；从属的；次等的；助手；第二位；另外的；二等品；次品

sense_info_list.en: being next after the first in time or order

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Second</highlight>, growth obviously affected the absolute size both of systems and individual institutions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，增长明显影响了系统和单个机构的绝对规模。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Second</highlight>, it is surely a good thing that the money and attention come to science rather than go elsewhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，资金和注意力倾注到科学领域而非其他地方，这无疑是一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Second</highlight>, paper checks have the advantage that they provide receipts, something that many consumers are unwilling to give up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，纸质支票的优势在于可以提供收据，这是许多消费者不愿放弃的。

sense_info_list.en: a 60th part of a minute of time or of a degree

examination_example.sentence: She found similar interference when participants watched 15-<highlight>second</highlight> clips of pairs of people and judged whether they were strangers, friends, or dating partners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她发现，当参与者观看15秒的成对的人的视频片段并判断他们是陌生人、朋友还是约会对象时，也存在类似的干扰。

examination_example.sentence: These pauses typically occur at about three per <highlight>second</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些停顿通常每秒钟大约发生三次。

examination_example.sentence: Runners range from four years old to grandparents; their times range from Andrew Baddeley's world record 13 minutes 48 <highlight>seconds</highlight> up to an hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑步者从四岁孩童到祖父母辈都有；他们的用时区间从Andrew Baddeley的世界纪录13分48秒到一小时不等。

sense_info_list.en: a very short period of time

examination_example.sentence: Human drivers sometimes must make split-<highlight>second</highlight> decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类驾驶员有时必须在一瞬间做出决定。

sense_info_list.en: support a suggestion, motion, or nomination
another of the same type

word_usage.usage: second可以用作及物动词，表示“支持某人; 赞同某观点”。
a second表示“再一个; 再一次”，for a second表示“一会儿; 片刻”，而in a second表示“立刻; 很快”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 第二的(人/事物); 第二名

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 第二的；第二位的；副的；二代的；中等教育的；次级的；仲的

word_family.mean: num. 第二；第二次；从属的；次等的；助手；第二位；另外的；二等品；次品

sense_info_list.en: being next after the first in time or order
sense_info_list.zh: 第二的(人/事物); 第二名

examination_example.sentence: Likewise, the <highlight>second</highlight>—a passion for founding the venture—doesn't necessarily translate into great success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，第二点——创办企业的热情——不一定会转化为巨大的成功。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>second</highlight> cause was attributed to the managers' characteristics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二个原因归因于管理者的特点。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>second</highlight> alert was sounded at 6:43 pm, and the blaze was discovered on the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二次警报于下午6:43响起，在屋顶上发现了大火。

sense_info_list.en: a very short period of time
a 60th part of a minute of time or of a degree

examination_example.sentence: His maiden rocket voyage lasted a mere three <highlight>seconds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的首次火箭航行只持续了三秒钟。

word_usage.usage:
second表“秒”时，为可数名词。a second或seconds均用于表示很短的时间。
示例：Seconds later, firefighters reached his door.
片刻之后，消防员赶到了他家门口。

second表“第二的, 第二个的”，为序数词，前面一般要加定冠词the。
示例：This is the second time it's happened.
这已是第二次了。

a second表示数量或序数的增加。
示例：Italy scored a second goal. 
意大利队射入第二个球。

second前如有物主代词修饰，则无需再加冠词。
示例：She is their second child.
她是他们的第二个孩子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 第二的(人/事物); 第二名

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: being next after the first in time or order
sense_info_list.zh: 第二的(人/事物); 第二名

examination_example.sentence: At this time, ReBicycle got involved and gave Leila a <highlight>second</highlight>-hand bicycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此时，ReBicycle也参与进来，给了Leila一辆二手自行车。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about many of the students in the <highlight>second</highlight> test group after the phone rang?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电话响了之后，我们对第二组的很多学生了解到了什么？

examination_example.sentence: During the <highlight>second</highlight> half of the 20th century, grain prices rose dramatically several times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶，粮食价格大幅上涨数倍。

sense_info_list.en: a 60th part of a minute of time or of a degree

examination_example.sentence: Minutes and <highlight>seconds</highlight> are the verbal and written representations of an uncommon base-60 number system used in ancient Mesopotamia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 分和秒是古代美索不达米亚使用的一种不常见的60基数数字系统的口头和书面表示。

examination_example.sentence: Your day is ruled by minutes and <highlight>seconds</highlight>, but these concepts are not real in any physical sense.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的一天是由分和秒支配的，但这些概念在任何物理意义上都是不真实的。

sense_info_list.en: another of the same type
a very short period of time
support a suggestion; motion; or nomination

word_usage.usage:
a second表示数量或序数的增加。
示例：Italy scored a second goal. 
意大利队射入第二个球。

second表“第二的, 第二个的”，为序数词，前面一般要加定冠词the。
示例：This is the second time it's happened.
这已是第二次了。

second表“秒”时，为可数名词。a second或seconds均用于表示很短的时间。
示例：Seconds later, firefighters reached his door.
片刻之后，消防员赶到了他家门口。

second前如有物主代词修饰，则无需再加冠词。
示例：She is their second child.
她是他们的第二个孩子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 第二的；第二位的；副的；二代的；中等教育的；次级的；仲的

word_family.mean: num. 第二；第二次；从属的；次等的；助手；第二位；另外的；二等品；次品

sense_info_list.en: another of the same type

examination_example.sentence: Learning English as a <highlight>second</highlight> language can be a painful experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把英语作为第二语言来学习可能是一个痛苦的经历。

sense_info_list.en: a 60th part of a minute of time or of a degree

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Seconds</highlight> later, our lizard emerged from its tank with its old skin flowing behind it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几秒后，蜥蜴从水箱里钻了出来，蜕下的皮在身后漂着。

examination_example.sentence: The pan was too hot and the bread turned black within <highlight>seconds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 平底锅太烫了，面包几秒钟内就变黑了。

examination_example.sentence: Just a <highlight>second</highlight>, Mr. White.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 怀特先生，请稍等。

sense_info_list.en: being next after the first in time or order

examination_example.sentence: Next, Jeff turned on the <highlight>second</highlight> stove (炉) burner to heat up the frying pan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，Jeff打开第二个炉灶，加热煎锅。

examination_example.sentence: Children should learn a <highlight>second</highlight> language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小孩应该学习第二种语言。

examination_example.sentence: During my <highlight>second</highlight> year at the city college, I was told that the education department was offering a "free" course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在市立大学读二年级时，有人告诉我，教育系提供一门“免费”课程。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 第二的(人/物); 第二名

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 第二的；第二位的；副的；二代的；中等教育的；次级的；仲的

word_family.mean: num. 第二；第二次；从属的；次等的；助手；第二位；另外的；二等品；次品

sense_info_list.en: being next after the first in time or order
sense_info_list.zh: 第二的(人/物); 第二名

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Second</highlight>, walking on tiptoes (脚趾) is good for your eyesight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，用脚尖走路对视力有好处。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Second</highlight>, screen use can do harm to children's brains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，使用屏幕会对孩子的大脑造成伤害。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>second</highlight> part, they are taught to write their own stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第二部分，他们被指导着来写自己的故事。

sense_info_list.en: a 60th part of a minute of time or of a degree

examination_example.sentence: Now students can find anything on the internet in <highlight>seconds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在学生可以在几秒钟内在网上找到任何东西。

examination_example.sentence: Right now, there are 5 new Facebook users every <highlight>second</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，每秒有5个新的Facebook用户。

examination_example.sentence: If we save one <highlight>second</highlight>, the patient may have a better chance to live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们节省一秒钟，病人可能有更大的生存机率。

sense_info_list.en: another of the same type

examination_example.sentence: And a <highlight>second</highlight> idea I got was to use a scarecrow(稻草人).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的另一个想法是使用稻草人。

examination_example.sentence: His mother heard fear in his voice as he called her a <highlight>second</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他第二次打电话给他母亲时，他的母亲听到他的声音中的恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: But the study found that searching online is one of the leading ways that people look for a <highlight>second</highlight> opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但研究发现，在线搜索是人们寻找另外观点的主要方式之一。

sense_info_list.en: a very short period of time

examination_example.sentence: The flower hesitated for a <highlight>second</highlight> and said, "Why are you so happy? You are not young and maybe you don't have many days left."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花犹豫了片刻，说:“你为什么这么开心？你不年轻了，也许你已经没有多少日子了。”

examination_example.sentence: In a <highlight>second</highlight>, he turned around and ran back family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一瞬间，他转过身跑回了家。

word_usage.usage:
second表“秒”时，为可数名词。a second或seconds均用于表示很短的时间。
示例：Seconds later, firefighters reached his door.
片刻之后，消防员赶到了他家门口。

second表“第二的, 第二个的”，为序数词，前面一般要加定冠词the。
示例：This is the second time it's happened.
这已是第二次了。

a second表示数量或序数的增加。
示例：Italy scored a second goal. 
意大利队射入第二个球。

second前如有物主代词修饰，则无需再加冠词。
示例：She is their second child.
她是他们的第二个孩子。
